3 workers are working in the forest, cutting trees day in and out.
A passer-by sees that 1st woodcutter is very unhappy, 2nd is ok, 3rd is very happy and working fast.
He asks the first woodcutter, what's going on ?
1st man replies - hard work, boring and tiresome.
He asks the 2nd man the same question.
2nd man say, I am ok, I am making a living, i have a family to feed.
He then asks the 3rd man, the happy one.
The 3rd man says, we are building a beautiful ship. This ship will take us out to a shiny blue sea and to magic lands.
Fill the sails of your employees with the big picture of shiny seas and magic lands.

The Bryant Commercial Real Estate (BCRE) team is committed to guiding you, as the franchisor/franchisee, through every facet of your Real Estate transaction from letter of intentthrough lease execution.  We go the extra mile, taking a holistic and collaborative approach with each and every client.Our 16-year history of representing business owners, as both buyers and sellers, has provided insight to the challenges the franchisee faces. We understand that when timelines are not met, it effects your business and your dream, which is why we have focused on positioning our company as a resource and connection to local vendors that you may require now and in the future.  Connecting you with key strategic partners  creates a streamlined process that includes important elements that you may need that includes construction management, facilities management, franchise consulting, and business brokerage. Our goal is to assist with the most seamless, inclusive roll-out possible.Whether your concept is one location or multiple locations we pride ourselves in being your strategic Real Estate Partners. Bryant Commercial Real Estate – Partners beyond the Transaction

Since its formation in 2014, Adrienne has maintained a keen interest in the services provided by Octavian and has worked in an advisory role to the company, using her network and own company to market the company. To Adrienne's delight, the opportunity arose for her to take on the position of working full-time to move the company from strength to strength. Her responsibilities are:* managing a specialist Facilities Managment, Security, and Janitorial Sales Team* working with Corporate and Government bodies * management/active involvement in the entire bid, procurement processes and strategy for growth* accountability for all new business pursuits/organic growth* developing a substantial revenue pipeline in one year* client relationship management lead * public speaking/ presentation * marketing/ PR/ social media management Operating across the USA, Europe, the Middle East and South Africa, Octavian works alongside blue chip and public sector organizations to reduce loss, manage risk, provide manpower resource and generally protect their operations and interests. Octavian integrates manned security with business risk/security consulting, together with the use of technical security systems. Services offered include Janitorial, Facilities Management, Manned Guarding, CCTV Remote Monitoring and Surveillance, Access/Egress Control Duties, Mobile Patrol and Site Visits, Executive Close Protection, K9 Patrols, Travel Security/employee protection, and Training.

summary: Bryant Commercial Real Estate, formed in 2013, was created by visionary and California native Adrienne Bryant. After many successful years working with commercial real estate firms, Bryant decided to step out on her own with her daughter to form Bryant Commercial Real Estate.Bryant Commercial Real Estate has continued to be forward thinking. They provide a holistic approach and create long lasting relationships with their clients by establishing trusting relationships and a one stop solution. Bryant Commercial has continued to focus on expanding their team to provide additional services which include:     ●  Site Selection     ●  Lease/Sales Negotiation     ●  Tenant Representation - Single and Multiple Locations     ●  Landlord Representation     ●  Acquisitions & Dispositions     ●  Franchise Brokerage | Consulting Services     ●  Project/Construction Management     ●  Facilities Management        Our team focuses on providing a value to our clients every day with passion and purpose. As business owners and commercial real estate brokers, our approach is focused not just on identifying the location of your business but on its success. From opening to succession planning, our team is available to assist you with any stage of this process.
